parts: From now on, return the output as a JSON object that can be loaded in Python with the key as 'text'. For example, {"text": "<output goes here>"}
{"text":"Sure, I can return the output as a regular JSON object with the key as `text`. Here is an example {"text":"Your Output"}.

content.text: I am an AI assistant designed to help you learn about eDominer Technologies Pvt Ltd and our products. I can answer your questions about our company, Expand smERP, and its features. I can also help you with product details from our database.
